scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:js && npm run build:html && npm run build:final-css
scripts.build:html: html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true -o web/dist/index.html web/index.html && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-js true --minify-css true -o web/dist/login.html web/login.html
scripts.build:final-css: purgecss --css web/dist/tailwind.full.css --content web/dist/*.html web/dist/*.js --output web/dist/styles.css && rm web/dist/tailwind.full.css
scripts.build:html:all: for file in web/*.html; do html-minifier-terser --config ./configs/html-minifier.config.js -o web/dist/$(basename $file) $file; done
